definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: Tibetan Buddhism Tangka art has a long history and superb techniques.
sentences.chinese: 藏传佛教的唐卡艺术历史悠久，技艺精湛。

sentences.english: Inside walls painted figures have landscape murals , painted exquisite skills.
sentences.chinese: 殿内四壁绘有人物山水壁画，绘技精湛。

sentences.english: With exquisite workmanship, PE celebrated, unique flavor from home or abroad.
sentences.chinese: 益以工艺精湛，风味独特著称，饮誉海内外。

sentences.english: No one dances more exquisitely or parties longer than the cariocas (residents of Rio).
sentences.chinese: 没有人能比里约人跳舞跳得更精湛，聚会时间更久。

sentences.english: Professor FENG Run-shen is engaged in medicine for more than 60 years.
sentences.chinese: 冯润身教授从医60余年，注重医德，医技精湛。

sentences.english: Import high-quality wood, top-level configuration, performance leading class technology.
sentences.chinese: 优质进口木材，顶级配置，性能领先，工艺精湛。

sentences.english: Some old folks are more skilled than younger people.
sentences.chinese: 有些老辈的手艺确实比现代人要精湛。

sentences.english: Korean soccer player has played the system and using acting caused a good thing to happen for their team.
sentences.chinese: 韩国足球队员演技精湛，以诈术骗得有利的判决。

sentences.english: Marie: What an extraordinary woman she is, generous and an excellent technician.
sentences.chinese: 她是个非凡的女人，宽容，术业精湛。

sentences.english: Wang Pingfen is one Threads of Yunnan participant from the area hit by that massive earthquake back in 1994.
sentences.chinese: 王品芬是彩线云南其中一名绣工精湛的参加者。

sentences.english: If the exquisite production craft, it will be icing on the cake.
sentences.chinese: 如果在制作时工艺精湛，那就更会锦上添花。

sentences.english: Wood grain applique carving is an exquisite workmanship of handmade carving arts.
sentences.chinese: 木纹画是一门精湛的纯手工剪刻工艺。

sentences.english: H. Auden, who remarked in his introduction on the young poet's technical virtuosity .
sentences.chinese: 奥登，后者在介绍中提到了这位年轻诗人精湛的技巧。

sentences.english: Unique technology with inalterable earths ensures exquisite wear all day.
sentences.chinese: 独特的技术与精湛的一成不变地球确保一整天不掉妆。

sentences.english: Has nearly two decades of production experience and excellent technology transfer.
sentences.chinese: 拥有近二十年的生产经验和精湛的转印技术。

sentences.english: Second, skill training should include consummate "China Gongfu".
sentences.chinese: 技能培养历练精湛的“中国功夫”。

definition: to reach perfection (idiom); a superb artistic achievement
exquisite/fine and delicate (usu. of works of art)
training in the basic skills/knowledge of the fundamentals
(idiom) to gasp in amazement/to acclaim as the peak of perfection
